subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Will Take Charge ground out a victory in the $600,000 Rebel Stakes in Hot Springs, Ark., nudging aside Oxbow for the victory by a head in the Kentucky Derby prep.
snippet: Will Take Charge ground out a victory in the $600,000 Rebel Stakes in Hot Springs, Ark., nudging aside Oxbow for the victory by a head in the Kentucky Derby prep.
